title: EasyUCS intersight config orgs drive_security_policies section
description: EasyUCS intersight config orgs drive_security_policies section JSON schema

primary_kmip_server.description: Drive Security Policy Primary KMIP server

enable_drive_security.description: Enable the selected KMIP Server configuration for encryption. This flag just enables the drive security and only after remote key setting configured, the actual encryption will be done.

ip_address.description: The IP address of the KMIP server. It could be an IPv4 address, an IPv6 address, or a hostname. Hostnames are valid only when Inband is configured for the CIMC address.

port.description: The port to which the KMIP client should connect.

timeout.description: The timeout before which the KMIP client should connect.

secondary_kmip_server.description: Drive Security Policy Secondary KMIP server

enable_drive_security.description: Enable the selected KMIP Server configuration for encryption. This flag just enables the drive security and only after remote key setting configured, the actual encryption will be done.

ip_address.description: The IP address of the KMIP server. It could be an IPv4 address, an IPv6 address, or a hostname. Hostnames are valid only when Inband is configured for the CIMC address.

port.description: The port to which the KMIP client should connect.

timeout.description: The timeout before which the KMIP client should connect.

server_public_root_ca_certificate.description: The certificate/ public key of the KMIP server. It is required for initiating secure communication with the server.

enable_authentication.description: Enables/disables the authentication for communicating with KMIP server. This flag enables the authentication which makes authentication mandatory.

username.description: The user name for the KMIP server login.

password.description: The password for the KMIP server login.
